comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: General note from the FL Memory Website about this image: Jean Wailes of Baltimore, Maryland, and Bob Williams of Honea Path, South Carolina, find out what to do next from Professor Earl Roman's book "Fishing for Fun in Salt Water".

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks zyrcster! I've added the general note to the description.
